name: Grymm
description:
All animations, art, and music have been made by me.

Use your mouse to control Grymm, left-click to launch the ball!

The game ends when the designated number of spirits are saved.

Each block is 5 points, each spirit doubles your score; so if you want a highscore, you're gonna have to take risks!

(Best played without full screen)

Font used: Dot Gothic 16 (Google Fonts) by Fontworks Inc.
